H0.text: Solids are materials that have both a defined shape and a defined volume.

H1.text: Liquids are materials that have both a defined shape and a defined volume.

H2.text: Matter is the term for materials that have both a defined shape and a defined volume.

H3.text: Gases are materials that have both a defined shape and a defined volume.

A4.text: In a solid, the particles are tightly packed and held in fixed positions, giving the material a definite shape and volume.

A5.text: A gas has no definite shape or volume, but occupies the entire container in which it is confined.
